advancements.fireworkfrenzy.adventure.so: Through blast jumping, accelerate to the speed of sound (...or thereabouts)
advancements.fireworkfrenzy.adventure.th: Perform 6 consecutive blast jumps without touching the ground
config.fireworkfrenzy.air_strafe_speed_m: Rocket jumping air strafe speed multiplier
config.fireworkfrenzy.airstrike_damage_m: Air Strike damage multiplier while rocket jumping
config.fireworkfrenzy.airstrike_grounded: Air Strike charge time while grounded
config.fireworkfrenzy.airstrike_jumping_: Air Strike charge time while rocket jumping
config.fireworkfrenzy.boost_cancels_rock: Boosting while elytra flying cancels rocket jumping
config.fireworkfrenzy.burst_disable_shie: Chance for Burst fireworks to disable shields
config.fireworkfrenzy.crossbow_allow_inf: Crossbows can have the Infinity enchantment
config.fireworkfrenzy.crossbow_charge_ti: Time it takes for the Crossbow to load
config.fireworkfrenzy.crossbow_use_rocke: Crossbows use firework rockets from your whole inventory
config.fireworkfrenzy.fireball_damage_bo: Extra damage added by a fire charge (Explosive Enhancement Mod Required)
config.fireworkfrenzy.mob_damage: Base firework rocket damage against mobs
config.fireworkfrenzy.player_damage: Base firework rocket damage against players
config.fireworkfrenzy.quick_charge_modif: Ticks per level quick charge removes from pull time
config.fireworkfrenzy.rocket_damage_fall: Minimum percentage of damage dealt at maximum falloff
Minimum distance away for damage falloff to apply
config.fireworkfrenzy.rockets_damage_fal: Damage falloff per meter from shooter
config.fireworkfrenzy.show_firework_dama: Show damage tooltip for Firework Rocket items
enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.air_strike.de: Decreases the Crossbow charge time while rocket jumping
enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.fixed_fuse.de: Removes the random fuse timer from Firework Rockets, allowing for mid-air jumps
enchantment.fireworkfrenzy.takeoff.desc: Removes self-damage from your own rockets
